knimeNode.name: Create Well Position
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node should be able to create a new string column with the well position, given two input columns with the plate row (numeric or alphabetic) and plate column (numeric) information. There should be an option whether to keep (default) or remove the two input columns.

intro.p: This node needs to have two Columns with the specific columns with the plate row (numeric or alphabetic) and plate column (numeric) information.The node will create a new string column with the well position in the format A1, B2, C3.

fullDescription.option: The string, double or integer column containing columns numbers of the well.
The string, double or integer column containing row numbers of the well.
Choose this if you want to dismiss the source columns
Chosse this for better sorting options, formate like A01, B02, C03

ports.inPort: Input port with the table to be converted and formatted.
ports.outPort: Output port with the new table
